sentences: Kõlas häire. Häire peale jooksis rahvas kokku.
Automaatliin on töötanud seni ilma ühegi häireta.
context: The Estonian word 'häire' has two main meanings: 1) A disruption, interference, or disturbance (often used in medical/technical contexts for problems with nerves, breathing, hearing, memory, etc.), and 2) An alarm or alert signal calling people together during emergencies. It can be found in compound words describing various types of disorders (like 'südamehäire' - heart disorder) or emergency alarms (like 'tulekahjuhäire' - fire alarm).
